name: 多款Apple产品信息泄露漏洞（CNVD-2025-22676）
product: ["Apple iOS <26", "Apple iPadOS <26", "Apple visionOS <26", "Apple watchOS <26", "Apple macOS Tahoe <26", "Apple tvOS <26", "Apple iOS <18.7", "Apple iPadOS <18.7", "Apple Safari <26"]
description: Apple Safari等都是美国苹果（Apple）公司的产品。Apple Safari是一款Web浏览器，是Mac OS X和iOS操作系统附带的默认浏览器。Apple iOS是一套为移动设备所开发的操作系统。Apple tvOS是一套智能电视操作系统。多款Apple产品存在信息泄露漏洞，该漏洞源于缓存处理不当，攻击者可利用该漏洞导致网站未经用户同意访问传感器信息。
solution:
厂商已发布了漏洞修复程序，请及时关注更新：
https://support.apple.com/en-us/125108
https://support.apple.com/en-us/125109
https://support.apple.com/en-us/125110
https://support.apple.com/en-us/125113
https://support.apple.com/en-us/125114
https://support.apple.com/en-us/125115
https://support.apple.com/en-us/125116
patch: 多款Apple产品信息泄露漏洞（CNVD-2025-22676）的补丁
